products.title: Galaxy Solar Blackout White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Galaxy solar blackout, a beautiful pleated set of blinds which comes in many different colours and are perfect for a kitchen. Product id: db-pls0110 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric. Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes galaxy solar blackout white pleated skylight blind in white.

products.title: Galaxy Solar Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Galaxy solar is the range of blinds made from pleated fabric that will add more texture to your room. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Product id: db-pls0047 fabric colour: silver material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
